Uses of Class
ij.process.FloatPolygon

  • Packages that use FloatPolygon 
    Package Description
    ij.gui  
    ij.process  

    • Uses of FloatPolygon in ij.gui

      Methods in ij.gui that return FloatPolygon 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      FloatPolygon Line.getFloatPoints()
      Returns, as a FloatPolygon, the two points that define this line.
      FloatPolygon ShapeRoi.getFloatPolygon() 
      FloatPolygon Roi.getFloatPolygon() 
      FloatPolygon PolygonRoi.getFloatPolygon()
      Returns this polygon or polyline as float arrays.
      FloatPolygon Line.getFloatPolygon()
      If the width of this line is less than or equal to one, returns the starting and ending coordinates as a 2-point FloatPolygon, or, if the width is greater than one, returns an outline of the line as a 4-point FloatPolygon.
      FloatPolygon Roi.getInterpolatedPolygon()
      Returns, as a FloatPolygon, an interpolated version of this selection that has points spaced 1.0 pixel apart.
      FloatPolygon Roi.getInterpolatedPolygon(double interval, boolean smooth)
      Returns, as a FloatPolygon, an interpolated version of this selection with points spaced 'interval' pixels apart.
      FloatPolygon PolygonRoi.getInterpolatedPolygon(double interval, boolean smooth) 
      FloatPolygon PolygonRoi.getNonSplineFloatPolygon() 
      Constructors in ij.gui with parameters of type FloatPolygon 
      Constructor and Description
      PointRoi(FloatPolygon poly)
      Creates a new PointRoi from a FloatPolygon.
      PolygonRoi(FloatPolygon p, int type)
      Creates a new polygon or polyline ROI from a FloatPolygon.
